alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Toombs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Toombs and south central Emanuel Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Lyons, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lyons, Vidalia, Ponderosa and Normantown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
